website_summaries.verdict: This set offers a great variety of accessories for the most common Instant Pot sizes.
pros: Includes 2 steamer baskets, springform pan, egg steamer rack, tongs, egg bites mold, silicone pad, oven mitts, and a magnet with cooking times and temperatures for common foods
Made of food grade silicone and stainless steel
Dishwasher safe and easy to use
Includes a 90 day money back guarantee and a 1 year warranty
cons: A couple buyers received some broken pieces

customer_reviews.title: Durable Set for IP
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for the last 3 months and have found the metal to be durable and easy to use. The silicone pot holders hold up to the heat of taking hot pans out of the oven. The largest pot strainer fits inside the IP with around 2" to spare at the top for the lid to close. The tongs handles well when boiling, and the egg boiler helps keep them steady. I've put everything through the dishwasher without any issues. I wish it came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: BCM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This review is for Instapot 6qt. The only thing I have used so far is the egg mold. Easy to use and take them out from the mold. Making egg bites for my kids every morning . But I love the sets. Excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: erlina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit! This set has everything a new IP owner would want to start cooking with the best kitchen tool invented. The egg bite mold is a bit smaller than if you bought a baby-food mold, but will work for the same purpose and your egg bites will be equally delicious. The egg cooker rack is great and the steamer will be exactly what many recipes call for. The springform pan is also a necessity for a number of fun recipes m so all in all, the pieces are exactly what you’d buy separately, however with this kit, you’ll save a bit of $$. I’d recommend for all new Instant Pot users.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Good set for Instant pots
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety. I have yet to use all pieces. My only complaint is that there were no directions included to let me know what each piece is used for. I attempted emailing company and never got a response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expands the uses of my Instapot - mostly.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for accessories that mostly expand the uses of my Instapot. The basic rack is redundant of the rack included with the Instapot. I have not found the egg rack to be any better than the rack included in the Instapot. Silicone mitts are helpful, but not necessary. I haven't really found a use for the plate grabber. I like the magnets with shorthand info. The baking pan is essential. I like the steamer divider. I haven’t used the egg bites pan, but I plan to do so.
customer_reviews.author: TulumChica

customer_reviews.title: poached eggs!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I got the set because I want to make poach eggs with the mold. I switched to healthy cooking methods such as steaming, baking and boiling and this set is perfect for it. Can't wait to try them out!
customer_reviews.author: Vinh Phung

customer_reviews.title: Great Instant Pot Accessory Kit
customer_reviews.text: Everything came as described for my Instant Pot. The accessories are all working and super great to have added to my pot. Looking forward to my first cheese cake. This kit is a must have great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Instant Pot Accessories Set is good
customer_reviews.text: Instant Pot Accessories Set is good. IT includes all the accessories for my instant pot cooking. I use them everyday for cooking. high quality. great product
customer_reviews.author: jinmihere

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to like this product
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited when this product came. Slowly as I am using things I am realizing how unhappy I am with this product. The recipe book has so many errors, such as spelling and the wrong measurement amounts as well as the wrong recipe for the title on the page. The measuring spoons were marked wrong and the stuff I have used so far is poorly made. The tongs are the only great thing I have used so far. I am truly afraid to use the stuff that goes in the instant pot itself considering the poor quality of everything else .
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Torrance

customer_reviews.title: Works great? but do not know what all the attachments are for?
customer_reviews.text: i love this for my 6 ot pressure cooker. fit very well and i like the fact that the food is not in the water and you have control over that. I have used it 4 times since i received it and the eggs came out greeeeeeeeeat... Just there is no manual for all of the items in the kit. can is get an idea of the usefulness of the pieces
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A small box, but its all there
customer_reviews.text: When my box arrived, I thought to myself, there is NO WAY everything is in here...they either sent me the wrong thing...or this was a scam. BUT when I opened it, I realized some magical elves packed this thing! Everything was in there and as I unpacked there were even I few things I hadn't really realized I would get (although there were on the list when I reread it). I have been using the materials and couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ploeckelman

customer_reviews.title: Good bundle
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of slightly different bundles that I had a tough time choosing between. Ultimately bought this one as the stuff beyond the "standard" (steaming pots, egg bite mold, etc) were things I'd more likely use. Only problem so far is that one of the handles for the steamer pot was missing. Thankfully it works with just the one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Instant Pot accessories ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best Instant Pot accessories I have ever purchased anywhere. I will buy from this Company again. You get exactly what you see. These are sturdy, great quality, easy to use and easy to clean. Amazing Price for how much you get. If I was to buy all of this in a store, I would be paying triple the amount if not more for what you pay for here. I WILL be buying from them again and again. :) Thank you so much for the Amazing products you offer.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of similar accessory sets on Amazon but ultimately chose this one by MIBOTE and I'm happy I did. It's been an excellent addition to the base accessories that came with my Instant Pot and definitely a must have for any instant pot owner!
customer_reviews.author: DawgPwnd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Accessory Package for Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this assortment of accessories and have used almost all of them at least once and many of them numerous times. Sturdy, solid construction, easy to clean and all the pieces meant to go in the pot have fit the pot perfectly (6 qt.). Would recommend this set for anyone looking for an all-in-one accessory set for their instant pot.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Farley

customer_reviews.title: I can't recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 1 star because of the written information included. It had 9 major spelling errors in the titles on 28 pages. One recipe had 3 out of 18 lines of script WITHOUT errors. It looks worse than my texting! There are no instructions on how to use any pieces included. Not one!
customer_reviews.author: sherlicks

customer_reviews.title: Lots of cool gadgets
customer_reviews.text: Love the products, however it came with a small recipe book that must have been translated by someone who doesn't know English. Very difficult to understand and lots of spelling and recipe errors. The measuring spoons are in metric, however all other prodects are really nice. Easy to clean, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have an instant pot, this is a must have!!️
customer_reviews.text: Every product you need and not just for your instant pot. I love the spring form pan- just made lasagna. The egg molds work like a charm. The pot holders work very well when taking the metal pan out if the pot. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you read the size
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you match the sizes so you don't get any unpleasant surprises. Some of my items (the steamer basket and meat racket fit width wise but not the height). It was a chance I took though. Other than that everything else works perfectly fine. They make cooking and clean up much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Even though it had quite a few pieces. most were cheap and flimsy. It also does not come with an explanation of the items. I had to go back to my order to see what the pieces were and how they were intended to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas N. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Accessories Set
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this set. Since I purchased my Instant Pot Accessories I have not used my oven once. Everything I needed in one place, thank you. The magnets for the fridge have been a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: An excellent variety of accessories that I’m most likely to use often.
customer_reviews.text: A nice accessory set for mi InstaPot. I looked at several different sets & finally settled on this one. I’m very happy with it as it has items I’m most likely to use often, making my InstaPot an even better value.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A Gray

customer_reviews.title: Excited but rack came broken.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get my 101 piece set today! I can not wait to use all my new IP toys! I have so many ideas that I can not wait to try! Lots of pieces for the price! My ONLY complaint and reason for 4 starts opposed to 5 is that my steamer rack came broken! The legs are broken off, making it useless. I hope the test of the stuff in this set holds up better than this piece! I was so excited to have a steamer rack with handles too... disappointing. The box it came in looked like it had been stepped on a few times but everything else is in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Ulloa

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value!
customer_reviews.text: Wide variety of items in this set. Very well made, and fits great in my 6qt Crockpot Express!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm to to the pressure cooker thing. The product is nicely made and has made the experience for me a little easier. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Lots of gadgets but not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: not the best quality. Silicone mitts came torn. Recipe book has lots of typos that it makes me wonder about the directions. Does come with a lot of items that I hope will make cooking easier in the instant pot
customer_reviews.author: ALo

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and great item
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this purchase. Loving my instant pot and the accessories. Seller sent this packaged well and in fast time. So pleased with this. Great items and great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: good deal- useful products
customer_reviews.text: If you use your IP regularly- or even sporadically, you should probably buy this. Makes your life much easier when cooking with the IP

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Need product information
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive any paperwork or information for each piece on what it is and how to use it. This should have been included. I can"t give any stars yet as I just received the product, well, I have to give stars to post this.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Love all the accessories especially cheesecake pan and mini potholders

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It has a lot of thjngs for the price. I haven't use it so I don't know how good they are. The only flaw is that it doesn't have instructions on what is what, there are some things that I don't know what they are and I don't know how to use them there for. But everything looks good.

customer_reviews.title: Needed these handy accessories to use with my instant pot.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these accessories cooking chicken, hard boiled eggs, and broccoli. They are very handy to use and easy to clean.

customer_reviews.text: I haven't used all of the accessories but the ones I have have been good!! The little cookbook has some errors but I can figure them out.

customer_reviews.title: Missing accessories
customer_reviews.text: There were some missing accessories. Not everything pictured was in the Box. GRRR... don't want to go through the hassle of returning.

customer_reviews.title: Fun time to come
customer_reviews.text: Just got my box today & everything was there & looked amazing. I washing everything....except the paper.... can’t wait to cook dinner tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine McKay

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck. I purchased this as a gift for a family member. They were ecstatic over everything included. They couldn't believe all the great items.
customer_reviews.author: Tina W

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality & great kit
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the purchase of this Instant Pot Kit. Everything appears well made. I am new to the Instant Pot Community & this is a great kit that offers most everything I need as a beginner.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Seems ok good amount of stuff. Haven’t really used most of it yet which is also why no durability rating. All in all a fairly nice sett with what seems like a good value at this price

customer_reviews.title: Don't put the springform pan in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the accessories, however it should be noted that the springform cake pan is not suitable for the dishwasher, as it rusted. The little recipe book has numerous spelling errors, but otherwise happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bridges

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love how many things are in this kit. I feel like the quality is not extremely high but it does the job! It’s great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle of accessories.
customer_reviews.text: There’s nothing about these products that I dislike. Everything works exactly like what was described. The best purchase I’ve made in quite a while. I’m so pleased with the service, transaction and product.

customer_reviews.title: Allows for variety and ease of instant cooking
customer_reviews.text: I’m so excited to play with all the different items in the pack. It’s prompted me to make different things just so I can use all the items. So far, I’ve had it for a week, it cleans easily and I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Instant pot necessities
customer_reviews.text: If you want to try different recipes in your Instant Pot, you’ll need these accessories. I use the trivet, the egg holder, and the “egg bite” mold the most.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: My family and I love this set! We use it all the time, it has made using our instant pot easier. We are able to do so many more recipes and have everything we need.

customer_reviews.title: All but strainer works
customer_reviews.text: No matter how I try, the larger strainer piece does not fit my 5 qt. IP... even though the ad specifically said it would.

customer_reviews.text: Love this assortment of accessories for the instant pot. It has everything I needed to get started. All items are exactly as shown.

customer_reviews.title: They work really well and fit into my 6 qt Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: The items are well made and work well in my Instant pot. Everything was included and works great! They also wash well in the dishwasher. I will buy again!

customer_reviews.title: A good choice in a sea of options.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased. The package contains everything advertised and the materials seem high quality and sturdy. There is also a short recipe guide not mentioned in the original description so that is a nice plus since I'm new at Instant Pot cooking. Also, the egg molds have a matching silicone lid which I noticed some other products from other sellers did not. Overall, satisfactory product at a fair price.

Overall for the money, this is a great purchase for someone starting to use their instant pot and wanting to get to know how to make a wide variety of foods.

product_meta.title: MIBOTE 101 PCS Accessories Set for Instant Pot 5,6,8 Qt, 2 Steamer Baskets, Springform Pan, Egg Steamer Rack, Egg Bites Mold, Kitchen Tong, Silicone Pad, Oven Mitts, Cheat Sheet Magnet, and etc
feature_bullets: Complete Accessories Set of - This 101 PCS instant pot accessories set included all the accessories you need to cook. Includes: steamer baskets, springform pan,steamer rack, egg rack, egg cutter, egg ring, egg whisk, egg bites mold, dish plate clip, spatula, kitchen tong, spatulas, silicone pad, silicone scrubber, silicone oven mitts, magnetic sheets and cook recipe.

Premium Quality for Your Safety - Your safety is our first priority. We only using the Certificated Silicone and SS304 Stainless Steel material, which is PBA Free and odor Free. Also our electric pressure cooker accessories meet the US Food-Grade standards. The instant pot accessories are sturdy and durable, easy to clean and dishwasher safe.

Offer Healthier Cooking Methods - Steaming is one of the best cooking choice as it remains up to 90% nutrient compared to frying and grilling. You can cook varieties of foods with our instant pot accessories, such as seafood, vegetables, eggs, meat, cakes, pudding, finger foods and etc. You can reheat multiple items at once and save time! A perfect set for cooks.

Endless Meal Potential - Our cheat sheet includes cooking times for 45 common foods, and come with a cooking recipe, no more looking it up on a computer, smartphone or manual. Now it is on a magnet which easily sticks to your appliance, refrigerator or INSTA. This set is compatible with most 5,6,8 Qt Quart instant pot models including IP-DUO50, IP-DUO60, IP-LUX60 and IP-DUO80 and other brand pressure cookers.
